channel.title: Automation for a non automatic game
channel.description: I'm playing a game called Wurm Online.. It's a great game till you have to craft items, ie: 200 small nails, 500 bricks... ect. The right click menus change position to prevent mouse macros. If anyone could tell me how to achieve this, that would be awesome.

item.title: Automation for a non automatic game
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

sevein:

I’m playing a game called Wurm Online… It’s a great game till you have to craft items, ie: 200 small nails, 500 bricks… ect. The right click menus change position to prevent mouse macros. If anyone could tell me how to achieve this, that would be awesome.

As said above use Simba, I’ve created auto impers/auto miners etc with ease using it.

The right click menus changing position is easy to get past just learn how to find text and then you can search for example “mine forward” in a certain area of the screen.

Happy wurming!

long time edit - simba does not find colours on wurm anymore, and hasn’t done since 2011. so it’s useless.

Read full topic
item.source: Automation for a non automatic game

item.title: Automation for a non automatic game
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

The simplest way would be to use Simba (http://villavu.com)
